analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/20/0xc3d2fae2fbec8db5ef4a43c8b53276ab21bc1ce2.sol:
	Contract SecretCoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/20/0xc3d2fae2fbec8db5ef4a43c8b53276ab21bc1ce2.sol#215)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/20/0xc3d2fae2fbec8db5ef4a43c8b53276ab21bc1ce2.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/20/0xc3d2fae2fbec8db5ef4a43c8b53276ab21bc1ce2.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/20/0xc3d2fae2fbec8db5ef4a43c8b53276ab21bc1ce2.sol#85) is not in mixedCase
